summary: This is a MoneyGram Certificate of Authenticity signed by Erin Stotts, a Law Enforcement Liaison, attesting to the authenticity of attached financial records. It is a procedural document used to certify business records for legal purposes, likely as part of an investigation.

persons.name: Erin Stotts
persons.role: Law Enforcement Liaison at MoneyGram Payment Systems Inc.
persons.context: The signatory of the Certificate of Authenticity, declaring the attached financial records are true and correct business records.

keyFacts: A MoneyGram Certificate of Authenticity was executed by Erin Stotts.
The document certifies that attached financial records were made at or near the time of the events, kept in regular business activity, and made as a regular practice.
The certification is made under penalty of perjury pursuant to 28 U.S.C. ยง 1746.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of a series of records (EFTA01265796, EFTA01265797).
